summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BULL SAGE DeFi features including wallet integration and DeFi scanner functionality. All major features working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Regular user can access admin stats endpoint when should be forbidden
minor_bugs.impact: Security concern - non-admin users can view admin statistics

passed_tests: DeFi navigation links visible in sidebar (Wallets DeFi, Scanner DeFi)
Wallet page loads and displays correctly
All 4 supported chains displayed (Solana, Ethereum, Polygon, BSC)
Connect wallet dialog opens and functions properly
DeFi Scanner page loads and displays trending tokens
Token data shows all required fields (score, price, volume, liquidity)
Chain filter works correctly (Solana to Ethereum)
Backend API endpoints for wallet and scanner functioning
DeFi scanner returns proper token data structure
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin access control - regular users should not be able to access /api/admin/stats endpoint (return 403 instead of 200)
